fields.name: - In competitive play:
fields.value:
- While this is in your hand, limited cards in your hand do not decrease the Limited Factor of that card.
 - This is a public effect.
 - If 2+ people have this card after a round ends, all copies of this card turn into an Unlucky Charm (2111), regardless as to whether or not it has been brought to the competitive play session.
 - When discarded, **limited cards are no longer limited**. Additionally, **Exhaust** this card.

fields.name: - Outside competitive play:
fields.value:
- This card gains the <:rulebreaker:1120899966555127899> color.
 - You may choose to ignore a color's secondary draw effects when held.
 - You cannot discard this card. However, you may play this card. When you do, the secondary draw effect of a color of your choice is removed from the game.
